resources.string: A Practical Guide to Right Living

The Dhammapada is a collection of sayings of the Buddha in verse form and one of the most widely read and best known Buddhist scriptures. The Dhammapada App With Pāḷi, English, Myanmar, Burmese: ပါဠိ Language. \n\n English version is translated from the Pali by Acharya Buddharakkhita. Access to Insight (BCBS Edition), 30 November 2013, http://www.accesstoinsight.org.
